verses.verse: The word <WH1697> that came to Jeremiah <WH3414> from the LORD <WH3068> in the tenth <WH6224> year <WH8141> of Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>, which was the eighteenth <WH8083> <WH6240> <WH8141> year <WH8141> of Nebuchadrezzar <WH5019>.

For then the king <WH4428> of Babylon's <WH894> army <WH2428> besieged <WH6696> Jerusalem <WH3389>: and Jeremiah <WH3414> the prophet <WH5030> was shut up <WH3607> in the court <WH2691> of the prison <WH4307>, which was in the king <WH4428> of Judah's <WH3063> house <WH1004>.

For Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> had shut him up <WH3607>, saying <WH559>, Wherefore dost thou prophesy <WH5012>, and say <WH559>, Thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068>, Behold, I will give <WH5414> this city <WH5892> into the hand <WH3027> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, and he shall take <WH3920> it;

And Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> shall not escape <WH4422> out of the hand <WH3027> of the Chaldeans <WH3778>, but shall surely <WH5414> be delivered <WH5414> into the hand <WH3027> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, and shall speak <WH1696> with him mouth <WH6310> to mouth <WH6310>, and his eyes <WH5869> shall behold <WH7200> his eyes <WH5869>;

And he shall lead <WH3212> Zedekiah <WH6667> to Babylon <WH894>, and there shall he be until I visit <WH6485> him, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068>: though ye fight <WH3898> with the Chaldeans <WH3778>, ye shall not prosper <WH6743>.
And Jeremiah <WH3414> said <WH559>, The word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559>,

Behold, Hanameel <WH2601> the son <WH1121> of Shallum <WH7967> thine uncle <WH1730> shall come <WH935> unto thee, saying <WH559>, Buy <WH7069> thee my field <WH7704> that is in Anathoth <WH6068>: for the right <WH4941> of redemption <WH1353> is thine to buy <WH7069> it.

So Hanameel <WH2601> mine uncle's <WH1730> son <WH1121> came <WH935> to me in the court <WH2691> of the prison <WH4307> according to the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068>, and said <WH559> unto me, Buy <WH7069> my field <WH7704>, I pray thee, that is in Anathoth <WH6068>, which is in the country <WH776> of Benjamin <WH1144>: for the right <WH4941> of inheritance <WH3425> is thine, and the redemption <WH1353> is thine; buy <WH7069> it for thyself. Then I knew <WH3045> that this was the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068>.

And I bought <WH7069> the field <WH7704> of Hanameel <WH2601> my uncle's <WH1730> son <WH1121>, that was in Anathoth <WH6068>, and weighed <WH8254> him the money <WH3701>, even seventeen <WH7651> <WH6235> shekels <WH8255> of silver <WH3701>. seventeen: or, seven shekels and ten pieces of silver

And I subscribed <WH3789> the evidence <WH5612>, and sealed <WH2856> it, and took <WH5749> witnesses <WH5707>, and weighed <WH8254> him the money <WH3701> in the balances <WH3976>. subscribed: Heb. wrote in the book
So I took <WH3947> the evidence <WH5612> of the purchase <WH4736>, both that which was sealed <WH2856> according to the law <WH4687> and custom <WH2706>, and that which was open <WH1540>:

And I gave <WH5414> the evidence <WH5612> of the purchase <WH4736> unto Baruch <WH1263> the son <WH1121> of Neriah <WH5374>, the son <WH1121> of Maaseiah <WH4271>, in the sight <WH5869> of Hanameel <WH2601> mine uncle's <WH1730> son, and in the presence <WH5869> of the witnesses <WH5707> that subscribed <WH3789> the book <WH5612> of the purchase <WH4736>, before <WH5869> all the Jews <WH3064> that sat <WH3427> in the court <WH2691> of the prison <WH4307>.
And I charged <WH6680> Baruch <WH1263> before <WH5869> them, saying <WH559>,

Thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>; Take <WH3947> these evidences <WH5612>, this evidence <WH5612> of the purchase <WH4736>, both which is sealed <WH2856>, and this evidence <WH5612> which is open <WH1540>; and put <WH5414> them in an earthen <WH2789> vessel <WH3627>, that they may continue <WH5975> many <WH7227> days <WH3117>.

For thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>; Houses <WH1004> and fields <WH7704> and vineyards <WH3754> shall be possessed again <WH7069> in this land <WH776>.

Now when <WH310> I had delivered <WH5414> the evidence <WH5612> of the purchase <WH4736> unto Baruch <WH1263> the son <WH1121> of Neriah <WH5374>, I prayed <WH6419> unto the LORD <WH3068>, saying <WH559>,

Ah <WH162> Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>! behold, thou hast made <WH6213> the heaven <WH8064> and the earth <WH776> by thy great <WH1419> power <WH3581> and stretched out <WH5186> arm <WH2220>, and there is nothing <WH1697> too hard <WH6381> for thee: too: or, hid from thee

Thou shewest <WH6213> lovingkindness <WH2617> unto thousands <WH505>, and recompensest <WH7999> the iniquity <WH5771> of the fathers <WH1> into the bosom <WH2436> of their children <WH1121> after <WH310> them: the Great <WH1419>, the Mighty <WH1368> God <WH410>, the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, is his name <WH8034>,

Great <WH1419> in counsel <WH6098>, and mighty <WH7227> in work <WH5950>: for thine eyes <WH5869> are open <WH6491> upon all the ways <WH1870> of the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120>: to give <WH5414> every one <WH376> according to his ways <WH1870>, and according to the fruit <WH6529> of his doings <WH4611>: work: Heb. doing

Which hast set <WH7760> signs <WH226> and wonders <WH4159> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, even unto this day <WH3117>, and in Israel <WH3478>, and among other men <WH120>; and hast made <WH6213> thee a name <WH8034>, as at this day <WH3117>;

And hast brought forth <WH3318> thy people <WH5971> Israel <WH3478> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> with signs <WH226>, and with wonders <WH4159>, and with a strong <WH2389> hand <WH3027>, and with a stretched out <WH5186> arm <WH248>, and with great <WH1419> terror <WH4172>;
And hast given <WH5414> them this land <WH776>, which thou didst swear <WH7650> to their fathers <WH1> to give <WH5414> them, a land <WH776> flowing <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>;

And they came in <WH935>, and possessed <WH3423> it; but they obeyed <WH8085> not thy voice <WH6963>, neither walked <WH1980> in thy law <WH8451>; they have done <WH6213> nothing of all that thou commandedst <WH6680> them to do <WH6213>: therefore thou hast caused all this evil <WH7451> to come <WH7122> upon them:

Behold the mounts <WH5550>, they are come <WH935> unto the city <WH5892> to take <WH3920> it; and the city <WH5892> is given <WH5414> into the hand <WH3027> of the Chaldeans <WH3778>, that fight <WH3898> against it, because <WH6440> of the sword <WH2719>, and of the famine <WH7458>, and of the pestilence <WH1698>: and what thou hast spoken <WH1696> is come to pass; and, behold, thou seest <WH7200> it. mounts: or, engines of shot

And thou hast said <WH559> unto me, O Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, Buy <WH7069> thee the field <WH7704> for money <WH3701>, and take <WH5749> witnesses <WH5707>; for the city <WH5892> is given <WH5414> into the hand <WH3027> of the Chaldeans <WH3778>. for the: or, though the
Then came the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> unto Jeremiah <WH3414>, saying <WH559>,
Behold, I am the LORD <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of all flesh <WH1320>: is there any thing <WH1697> too hard <WH6381> for me?

Therefore thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068>; Behold, I will give <WH5414> this city <WH5892> into the hand <WH3027> of the Chaldeans <WH3778>, and into the hand <WH3027> of Nebuchadrezzar <WH5019> king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, and he shall take <WH3920> it:

And the Chaldeans <WH3778>, that fight <WH3898> against this city <WH5892>, shall come <WH935> and set <WH3341> fire <WH784> on this city <WH5892>, and burn <WH8313> it with the houses <WH1004>, upon whose roofs <WH1406> they have offered incense <WH6999> unto Baal <WH1168>, and poured out <WH5258> drink offerings <WH5262> unto other <WH312> gods <WH430>, to provoke me to anger <WH3707>.

For the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> and the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> have only done <WH6213> evil <WH7451> before <WH5869> me from their youth <WH5271>: for the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> have only provoked me to anger <WH3707> with the work <WH4639> of their hands <WH3027>, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068>.

For this city <WH5892> hath been to me as a provocation of mine anger <WH639> and of my fury <WH2534> from the day <WH3117> that they built <WH1129> it even unto this day <WH3117>; that I should remove <WH5493> it from before my face <WH6440>, a provocation: Heb. for my anger

Because of all the evil <WH7451> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> and of the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063>, which they have done <WH6213> to provoke me to anger <WH3707>, they, their kings <WH4428>, their princes <WH8269>, their priests <WH3548>, and their prophets <WH5030>, and the men <WH376> of Judah <WH3063>, and the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem <WH3389>.

And they have turned <WH6437> unto me the back <WH6203>, and not the face <WH6440>: though I taught <WH3925> them, rising up early <WH7925> and teaching <WH3925> them, yet they have not hearkened <WH8085> to receive <WH3947> instruction <WH4148>. back: Heb. neck
But they set <WH7760> their abominations <WH8251> in the house <WH1004>, which is called <WH7121> by my name <WH8034>, to defile <WH2930> it.

And they built <WH1129> the high places <WH1116> of Baal <WH1168>, which are in the valley <WH1516> of the son <WH1121> of Hinnom <WH2011>, to cause their sons <WH1121> and their daughters <WH1323> to pass <WH5674> through the fire unto Molech <WH4432>; which I commanded <WH6680> them not, neither came <WH5927> it into my mind <WH3820>, that they should do <WH6213> this abomination <WH8441>, to cause Judah <WH3063> to sin <WH2398>.

And now therefore thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, concerning this city <WH5892>, whereof ye say <WH559>, It shall be delivered <WH5414> into the hand <WH3027> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> by the sword <WH2719>, and by the famine <WH7458>, and by the pestilence <WH1698>;

Behold, I will gather them out <WH6908> of all countries <WH776>, whither I have driven <WH5080> them in mine anger <WH639>, and in my fury <WH2534>, and in great <WH1419> wrath <WH7110>; and I will bring them again <WH7725> unto this place <WH4725>, and I will cause them to dwell <WH3427> safely <WH983>:
And they shall be my people <WH5971>, and I will be their God <WH430>:

And I will give <WH5414> them one <WH259> heart <WH3820>, and one <WH259> way <WH1870>, that they may fear <WH3372> me for ever <WH3117>, for the good <WH2896> of them, and of their children <WH1121> after <WH310> them: for ever: Heb. all days

And I will make <WH3772> an everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285> with them, that I will not turn away <WH7725> from them <WH310>, to do them good <WH3190>; but I will put <WH5414> my fear <WH3374> in their hearts <WH3824>, that they shall not depart <WH5493> from me. from them: Heb. from after them

Yea, I will rejoice <WH7797> over them to do them good <WH2895>, and I will plant <WH5193> them in this land <WH776> assuredly <WH571> with my whole heart <WH3820> and with my whole soul <WH5315>. assuredly: Heb. in truth, or, stability

For thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068>; Like as I have brought <WH935> all this great <WH1419> evil <WH7451> upon this people <WH5971>, so will I bring <WH935> upon them all the good <WH2896> that I have promised <WH1696> them.

And fields <WH7704> shall be bought <WH7069> in this land <WH776>, whereof ye say <WH559>, It is desolate <WH8077> without man <WH120> or beast <WH929>; it is given <WH5414> into the hand <WH3027> of the Chaldeans <WH3778>.

Men shall buy <WH7069> fields <WH7704> for money <WH3701>, and subscribe <WH3789> evidences <WH5612>, and seal <WH2856> them, and take <WH5749> witnesses <WH5707> in the land <WH776> of Benjamin <WH1144>, and in the places about <WH5439> Jerusalem <WH3389>, and in the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063>, and in the cities <WH5892> of the mountains <WH2022>, and in the cities <WH5892> of the valley <WH8219>, and in the cities <WH5892> of the south <WH5045>: for I will cause their captivity <WH7622> to return <WH7725>, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068>.
